de.griefed.monitoring

Class ApplicationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • de.griefed.monitoring.ApplicationProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    @Component
public class ApplicationProperties
extends java.util.Properties
    Class responsible for handling our properties. Loaded at boot in Main.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • LOG

        private static final org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger LOG

      • agent

        @Value(value="${de.griefed.monitoring.agent}")
private boolean agent
        Whether this instance is a monitor or an agent.

      • agents

        @Value(value="${de.griefed.monitoring.agents}")
private java.lang.String agents
        The agents, with their access tokens, to gather information form. Format is agent_ip1,access_token1;agent_ip2,access_token2;agent_ip3,access_token3 etc..

      • timeoutConnect

        @Value(value="${de.griefed.monitoring.timeout.connect}")
private int timeoutConnect
        Seconds to wait until a connection timeout is triggered for getting information from agents.

      • timeoutRead

        @Value(value="${de.griefed.monitoring.timeout.read}")
private int timeoutRead
        Seconds to wait until a read timeout is triggered for getting information from agents.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApplicationProperties

        @Autowired
public ApplicationProperties()
        Constructor for our properties. Sets a couple of default values for use in Monitoring.

    • Method Detail

      • isAgent

        public boolean isAgent()
        Getter for whether this instance is a monitor or an agent.
        Returns:
        boolean. true = agent. false = monitor.

      • getAgents

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAgents()
        Getter for a list of agents to gather information from.
        Returns:
        List String. Each entry is a combination of ip and access token in the format agent_ip1,access_token1.

      • getPorts

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getPorts()
        Getter for a list of ports to scan in InformationService for host availability.
        Returns:
        List int. Returns a list of ports which will be scanned to determine host availability.

      • getTimeoutConnect

        public int getTimeoutConnect()
        Getter for the number of seconds to wait until a connection timeout is triggered for getting information from agents.
        Returns:
        Integer. Returns the number of seconds as an int.

      • getTimeoutRead

        public int getTimeoutRead()
        Getter for the number of seconds to wait until a read timeout is triggered for getting information from agents.
        Returns:
        Integer. Returns the number of seconds as an int.
